title: Pahrump Hills
description: The Mars rover Curiosity is exploring the Pahrump Hills in Gale Crater. The region contains sedimentary rocks that scientists believe formed in the presence of water. Curiosity’s recent activities have included a mini-drilling test.
theme:
MARS. The Red Planet, one of the most desirable
destinations for humanity
